section.p: This document provides an overview of the new features contained within HPE Helion OpenStack 2.1.4.

section.title: Issues Fixed in this Release
section.p: This release includes the following fixes:

p.b: CVE-2016-2074 - Remote Code Execution (RCE) or Denial of Service (DoS) attacks in OVS.

section.p: A patched version of OVS version 2.3 has been included in HPE Helion OpenStack 2.1.4 to address this vulnerability.
A number of changes have been made to improve the reliability of RabbitMQ in shutdown/restart and upgrade scenarios.
In addition, version 2.1.4 includes further hardening of RabbitMQ.
To upgrade, follow the instructions in Upgrading to HPE Helion OpenStack 2.1.4
To perform a full install of HPE Helion OpenStack 2.1.4, follow the instructions for your specifications in the installation section.
